bind.calculate:
if(selected( /care/care/medical , 'zero'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/medical , 'two'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/medical , 'five'), 40, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/medical , 'fifty'), 40, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/knowledge , 'good'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/knowledge , 'some_what'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/knowledge , 'little'), 40, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/knowledge , 'none'), 40, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/adherence , 'always'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/adherence , 'usually'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/adherence , 'rarely'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/adherence , 'never'), 4, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/mental , 'no_history'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/mental , 'has_access'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/mental , 'failed_treatment'), 40, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/mental , 'serious'), 40, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/transportation , 'consistent'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/transportation , 'questionable'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/transportation , 'irregular'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/transportation , 'transportation_none'), 4, 0) +
if(selected( /care/care/financial , 'financial_stable'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/financial , 'financial_adequate'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/financial , 'financial_inadequate'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/financial , 'financial_none'), 4, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/legal , 'none'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/legal , 'needs_help'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/legal , 'some_asst'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/legal , 'full_asst'), 4, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/practical , 'practical_inadequate'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/practical , 'practical_some_asst'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/practical , 'practical_limitted'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/practical , 'practical_unable'), 4, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/activities , 'activities_regular'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/activities , 'activities_needs'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/activities , 'activities_resists'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/activities , 'activities_isolated'), 4, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/dental , 'dental_none'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/dental , 'dental_minor'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/dental , 'dental_moderate'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/dental , 'dental_major'), 4, 0) +
if(selected( /care/care/support , 'reliable'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/support , 'only'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/support , 'support_none'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/communication , 'communication_good'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/communication , 'temporary'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/communication , 'limitted'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/communication , 'communication_good'), 4, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/employment , 'employed'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/employment , 'ltd_probs'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/employment , 'unemployed'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/employment , 'unable'), 4, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/living , 'self_managed'), 1, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/living , 'adequate'), 2, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/living , 'unsafe'), 3, 0) + if(selected( /care/care/living , 'homless'), 4, 0)

input.label: Date of Level of Care Assessment:

item.label: In Care - CD4 >500; viral load <100/undetectable; in care, medically stable, and adheres to appointments without CM oversight; chronic condition under control with medication and/or treatment

Occasional - CD4 200-499; viral load 100-9,999; lab values stable; in care, generally medically stable, and adheres to appointments with CM assistance <30% of time; may have minor conditions requiring treatment

Frequent - CD4 50-199; viral load 10,000-100,000; lab values stable/ improving; no new side effects/ current side effects being controlled; inconsistent appointments, medically unstable, and CM intervention needed 30-74% of time

Poor in care - CD4 <50; viral load >100,000; lab values deteriorating; physical side effects increasing; new health issues emerging; medically unstable or unknown (newly diagnosed); not in care or CM intervention need >75% of appointments; pregnant female
Good - Effectively demonstrates knowledge of HIV disease and treatment
Somewhat - Can discuss knowledge and understanding of HIV; may have some misconceptions but listens when addressed
Little - Cannot fully communicate concerning HIV may have cultural or other barriers
None - Cannot or will not communicate concerning HIV; barriers cannot be fully addressed

Always - Always adheres to treatment; clearly communicates importance; no side effects or side effects are not interrupting activities of daily living; obtains meds without assistance; willingly participates in care plan
Usually - usually adheres to treatment; fair communication of importance; side effects are minimally impacting daily activities; participates in care plan

Rarely - Sometimes adheres to treatment; reflects little understanding or willingness to comply; side effects moderately impacting daily activities; does not readily participate in plan but follows most directives

Never - Rarely adheres to treatment; cannot communicate understanding of compliance; numerous side effects severely impacting daily activities; cannot or will not participate in plan; compliance issues
No history - No history of mental illness or violence/abuse; no family history
Has access - History of illness or abuse but connected and compliant with treatment; may need some support or counseling but otherwise functional
Failed treatment - History of illness or abuse; needs high level of emotional support; connected with treatment but may have compliance issues; experiencing stress
Serious - History of illness or abuse; active problems and crisis; requires significant emotional support and therapy but not accessing it; high stress; not functional
Consistent - Has own/other means of transportation consistently available
Questionable - Has general access to public/private transportation; must occasionally rely on others
Irregular - Has irregular access to public/private transportation
None - Public/private transportation unavailable
Enrolled - Has independently completed all necessary paperwork and received approval; no longer has need beyond possible annual reapplication
Pending -Completed necessary forms with limited assistance from CM; forms submitted; approval pending
Will Apply - Needs assistance from CM to complete forms; requires regular reminders; forms yet to be submitted or denied for reasons other than need
Denied -Needs assistance from CM to complete forms; will not meet with CM to complete; forms late for submission; application denied
Reliable - Has reliable friends/family to provide ongoing support
Questionable - Often has help, but not always reliable; in jeopardy if/when HIV status is divulged
Crisis only - Some support in a crisis only; resists group involvement
Good - Can effectively communicate concerns with CM; no language, sensory, cultural, or other barriers to care
Fair- Can generally communicate with CM; can read written materials and communicate understanding; no other barriers
Limited - Difficulty communicating with CM; cannot read written materials as provided; English not first language; interpreter needed at all appointments
None - Extreme difficulty communicating with CM; interpreter necessary but unavailable; barrier to care but cannot be easily resolved
Employed - Stably employed, regularly meets expenses
Temporary - Under- or temporarily employed; able and wants to work; has some job seeking skills
Unemployed -Unemployed or job threatened by HIV disease; able and wants to work at suitable job
Unable - Unemployed or unable to work on regular basis; no job-seeking skills
Self-managed -Has safe, stable, and clean living situation and has self-managed options
Adequate (Ltd Probs) -Has safe, stable, and clean living arrangement; externally controlled; payment up-to-date; limited self-managed options; known stressors may necessitate relocation
Unsafe -Housing unsafe, unstable, or ill-kept; week-to-week occupancy; no personal control; payments behind, or in temporary shelter; no self-managed options
Homeless -Facing imminent eviction or no place to live currently; NO self-managed options
Stable -Stable income/benefits adequate to meet needs; completes all necessary/ applicable benefit documents
Adequate -Adequate income; needs some help completing benefit documents; medical state may jeopardize income
Inadequate -Inadequate current resources; has not applied for benefits or awaiting benefit determination
None- No current resources; requires help to understand/complete benefit documents or benefits denied
None - All necessary legal documents completed
Needs Help - Needs some help completing standard documents
Some Assistance -Requires assistance with many documents
Full Assistance - Requires help understanding and completing most documents
Independent -Able to independently provide for own needs and perform all activities of daily living (ADLs)
Some Assistance -Can provide for some ADLs and arrange for the rest; may have dependent children not living in household
Limited -Limited capacity for arranging ADLs on a regular basis; dependent children in household with another adult in parental role
Unable - Unable to arrange for food, clothing, and other ADLs; client is a dependent child or has sole responsibility for dependent(s) in household
Regular -Regular involvement in spiritual, leisure, or other SSAs
Needs -Needs education/exposure to SSAs
Resists -Actively resists SSAs involvement
Isolated -Isolated from suitable SSAs
None - No dental needs beyond regular check-ups; has pay source
Minor -Minor dental needs; may need assistance from 3rd party payor
Moderate Significant dental needs affecting other health; needs pay source
Major - Major dental needs; needs pay source or denied; noncompliant in correcting issues

input.label: 15 = Limited Cases reviewed as needed, but at least annually
16-40 = Supportive Cases reviewed at least every 6 months
40+ Comprehensive Cases reviewed at least twice every month
Date of Level of Care Assessment:

item.label: Limited - cases reviewed as needed, but at least annually
Supportive - cases reviewed at least every 6 months
Comprehensive - Cases reviewed at least twice every month
